title: U.S. stocks, bond yields slip on report against Trump
text: U.S. stocks and government debt yields fell on Thursday after the release of a whistleblower complaint that accused President Donald Trump of pressing Ukraine to investigate one of his main political rivals in next year's U.S. presidential election.

text: The United States has been granted approval to impose tariffs on European Union goods with an annual trade value around $7.5 billion over illegal government support for European planemaker Airbus , people familiar with the matter said.

title: Commodities trader Cargill's quarterly profit rises 3% on beef, eggs demand
